svcsubproc.title: Step Well Assembly - Removal
svcsubproc.para: The entire step well assembly is removable if damaged. To remove use the following procedure:

step1.para: Remove the passenger entry doors. Refer to the Exterior Component Remove section of this service manual.
Remove the assist handrail assemblies and trim panels at the top corners of the step well compartment.
Remove the step well courtesy light and disconnect electrical connections in the step well area.
Remove or pull back the flooring material around the entry area.
Remove the crash barrier panel at the entrance way if required.
Locate the spot welded sections of the step well assembly attaching it to the bus floor assembly. Carefully grind the welds and remove the step well assembly.
Inspect the entry door lower cross bar for damage, including the mounting points for the entry door. Replace as needed.
